nodes.text: Joreel was a female Gran and a soldier for a resistance group on an backwater planet. She created her own overpowered repeating rifle, but it was prone to overheating. Joreel took part in the mission to Sunfall Peak in 0 ABY.

Joreel appears in the opening short story of the Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2014. She was also later used as a player's character in an example of gameplay given later in the book.
